thread.title: Russia appeals to UN aviation body to open new MH17 probe
thread.title_full: Russia appeals to UN aviation body to open new MH17 probe | News24

author: news24.com
title: Russia appeals to UN aviation body to open new MH17 probe
text:
Moscow - Russia has appealed to the International Civil Aviation Organisation to open a new probe into last year's downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over eastern Ukraine, the chief of the Russian aviation agency said on Wednesday.
The Boeing 777 crashed on July 17 2014, in the middle of a military conflict between Russia-backed separatists and Ukrainian government forces.
The Dutch Safety Board said in its final report released on Tuesday that the jet was destroyed by a Soviet-made Buk surface-to-air missile. Two-thirds of the 298 people who died were Dutch.
The 15-month probe did not explicitly say who had fired the missile, but it identified an area of 320km 2 from where it said the launch must have taken place. All of the land was in the hands of pro-Russian separatists fighting Ukrainian forces at the time of the disaster, according to daily maps of fighting released by the Ukrainian National Security Council.
